trans-unit.source: A factory class for creating <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> objects from Windows NT aliases, email addresses, and security identifiers (SIDs).
trans-unit.target: 處理站類別，用於使用 Windows NT 別名、電子郵件地址和安全性識別碼 (SID) 建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: All methods in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> are static and no instance needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> 中所有的方法為靜態，不需要建立任何執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式為隱藏。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /><see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />關聯的 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> object is used for changing the standard Active Directory schema properties that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class uses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> 物件用於變更 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> 類別使用的標準 Active Directory 結構描述屬性。

trans-unit.source: The alias string to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: 別名字串，用於建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 Windows NT 別名，建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 的執行個體，可說明指定的 Windows NT 別名。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> 是可用來存取 Active Directory 功能之 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> 抽象類別的具體實作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，Active Directory 存放區是用來儲存人員的組織資訊。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> 的主要用途是要針對商業用途，查詢這類組織資訊。

trans-unit.source: The email address string from which to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 的電子郵件地址字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using an email address.
trans-unit.target: 使用電子郵件地址建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 的執行個體，描述指定的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> 是可用來存取 Active Directory 功能之 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> 抽象類別的具體實作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，Active Directory 存放區是用來儲存人員的組織資訊。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> 的主要用途是要針對商業用途，查詢這類組織資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> to use to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />，用於建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using a Windows NT <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows NT <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> 的執行個體，說明指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> 是可用來存取 Active Directory 功能之 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> 抽象類別的具體實作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，Active Directory 存放區是用來儲存人員的組織資訊。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> 的主要用途是要針對商業用途，查詢這類組織資訊。
